data.text: @_InThisTogether Too right!...And...most people haven't been testing themselves 96 thousand times a perishin' day!!!!
@_InThisTogether If it was circulating in the Autumn of 2019 when in my locality a lot of people got sick with an unnamed bug then herd immunity would account for it.

@_InThisTogether Many people* know lots of triple jabbed relatives/friends who have caught (as defined by the tests) 'covid.
So either the 'vaccines' dont work, or the test dont work and are misdiagnosing flus/colds as 'covid'.
Either way its an epic global scandal.

* eg  me

@_InThisTogether I know a dozen and I hardly know anybody , err, if it really was Covid?  My sister is currently testing positive and said , “ if I didn’t test positive I would think that I had a cold”

@_InThisTogether In extreme cases, Covid is a flu that hardly deserves our attention, many deaths are the consequences of the treatments, not the disease, hence the paradox.  virology is a pseudoscience. 😳🔍😷💊🦠🐛 https://t.co/s7UpBeQzTZ
